amendment.description: An amendment numbered 14 printed in House Report 115-785 to reduce funding for Procurement, Defense-Wide, by $10 million and increases funding for Defense Health Programs by $10 million in order to address Triple Negative Breast Cancer research.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in House Report 115-785 to reduce funding for Procurement, Defense-Wide, by $10 million and increases funding for Defense Health Programs by $10 million in order to address Triple Negative Breast Cancer research.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A027) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
